entry.title: Dynabrade 40326 - Pneumatic Belt Sander Includes Arm 11287 For 5/8 Ox 3/4-20-1/2
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Belt Sanders
Price: 859.49

[shortdesc]
  • Dynafile II Abrasive Belt Tool
  • .5 hp, 7 Degree Offset, 20,000 RPM, Front Exhaust, 1/4 Inch-3/4 Inch W x 20-1/2 Inch L (6-19 mm x 521 mm) Belts
  • Grind, deburr, blend and polish, on metal, plastic, fiberglass, composites, rubber, glass and more
  • Grind from contact wheel or platen pad
  • finish and polish using slack of belt.
  • Lightweight, ergonomic 7 degree offset design
  • Grinding head pivots 360 degrees for securing in most efficient position.
  • Belt guard easily detaches for quick abrasive change
  • simple belt tracking adjustment knob.
  • Kit includes 11287 Contact Arm for 5/8 Inch or 3/4 Inch wide abrasive belts
  • (11287 is only arm that accepts 20-1/2 Inch long belts.)
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Exhaust Type Front
    Height 4-7/8 Inch
    Hose ID 3/8 Inch
    HP 0.5
    Product Type Belt Sanders
    RPM 20000

entry.title: Dynabrade Dynabelter 11477 - Pneumatic Belt Sander Ex Heavy Duty 2Hp Ver 1.2-30 Be
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dynabrade
Type: Belt Sanders
Price: 3154.08

[shortdesc]
  • Dynabelter Abrasive Belt Tool, Extra Heavy-Duty
  • 2 hp, Vertical, 7,200 RPM, Front Exhaust, for 1 Inch-2 Inch W x 30 Inch L (25-51 mm x 762 mm) Belts
  • For weld grinding, blending and finishing, on metal and other surfaces
  • Dynabelter is ideal for work on ferrous and non-ferrous metals, wood, plastic, stone and composites.
  • Uses include grinding cylinders, deburring castings, cleaning welds and fabricating metals
  • Also excellent for polishing tubing, deburring structural steel, finish-dimensioning on lathe work and blending inside corners
  • Safety-lock lever throttle included.
  • Extra Heavy-Duty, 2.0 hp model accepts 2 Inch wide x 30 Inch long abrasive belts
  • Includes pressure bar with top control handle
  • Includes 11870 Contact Arm Assembly.
  • 11871 Contact Arm with 4 Inch dia
  • contact wheel is available for 2 Inch wide x 60 Inch long belts, providing a 20 Inch workable reach
  • Optional 11891 Platen is available for 11871 Arm.
  • Ideal for use with 1/2 Inch Dynaswivel, and 98273 Coupler/Plug Assembly.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Dynabrade
    Line Dynabelter
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Belt Sanders
    RPM 7200
